data.title: NU SENTRAL CAR PARK INFORMATION
data.meta_description: Nu Sentral Parking Rate & Car Park Information. Jalan Tun Sambanthan, Brickfields, Kuala Lumpur, Cash. Touch N Go. Debit / Credit Card
data.text:
Monday to Friday (Weekdays)

First hour : RM5.00

Each and Every Subsequent Hour or Part Thereof : RM3.00 per hour

Normal Hourly* rate applies (After 6:00pm - 5.59am)

Saturday & Sunday (Weekend)

Normal Hourly* rate applies

* Enjoy a flat rate of RM5.00 when you spend RM50.00 on a single receipt (same day as receipt) @ any retail shop in NU Sentral Shopping Centre.

(Validate your card at the Customer Service Counter (Level G) by 10:00pm)

Public Holiday

* Enjoy a flat rate of RM5.00 when you spend RM50.00 on a single receipt (same day as receipt) @ any retail shop in NU Sentral Shopping Centre.

(Validate your card at the Customer Service Counter (Level G) by 10:00pm)

Motorcycle

Per entry : RM2.00

Penalty for Lost or Damaged Card : RM50.00
